alert.note: Alert for Owsley (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 29 at 2:46AM EDT until July 30 at 5:36AM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kentucky... The South Fork of the Kentucky River at Booneville, affecting Owsley County. ...A FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE FRIDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...The Flood Warning is for the South Fork of the Kentucky River at Booneville. * WHEN...The Flood Warning is in effect until late Friday night. * IMPACTS...At 35.0 feet, water enters the basement of a home off of Highway 30 on the right bank of the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2 AM EDT Friday the stage was 34.1 feet, and was near its crest. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage Friday night. - Flood stage is 27.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. The next statement will be issued by 5 AM.
